variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Patient's age at baseline

variable.description: Indicator: randomized in feasibility phase

variable.name: EXP
variable.description: Indicator: intensive treatment group

variable.name: YEAR
variable.description: Year of follow-up (2, 5, 7, or 9)

variable.name: XHBA
variable.description: Time-dependent HbA1c average to date

variable.name: CUMCNT
variable.description: Cumulative number of hypoglycemic events to date

variable.name: NOHYPO
variable.description: No episodes of coma/seizure (due to hypoglycemia) so far (1=y)

variable.description: Z-score, domain7: psychomotor efficiency

variable.name: DAD8
variable.description: Z-score for domain 8: motor speed

variable.name: XALERT
variable.description: Patient graded significantly worse this visit

variable.name: NDEF5
variable.description: Confirmed definite neuropathy year 5 (1=y)
